tagline: TeamCity build agent extensions for detecting Microsoft SDKs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: TeamCity - Microsoft SDKs plugin
body:
### TeamCity - Microsoft SDKs plugin

This plugin extends TeamCity Build Agent with Configuration Parameters based on the Microsoft SDKs installed on computer running the Build Agent.

Supported Microsoft SDKs:

* Windows Azure SDK (1.0 - 1.6)
* Windows Phone SDK (7.0, 7.1)
* ASP.NET MVC (1.0 - 4)
